column4: Just one last advert for the Ubuntu Popularity Contest before I go off to bed. If you are looking for the easiest possible way to help out Ubuntu without any technical skills, enable popcon: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuPopularityContest - the more "normal" (non-developer) users we can get to use it, the more value there is to the whole system. Goodnight all!
is this different from the debian version?
- same idea, but it points to popcon.ubuntu.com instead of the Debian server
